article: kiev , ukraine -lrb- ap -rrb- -- bernadette chirac , wife of french president jacques chirac , visited the ukrainian city of odessa on monday to unveil a plaque commemorating artist wassily kandinsky , a native son .
abstract: wife of french president visits odessa to honor kandinsky
